value.stringValue: Comment On Case For Inactive User https://accessgroup.my.salesforce.com/{!FoundCase.Id}

Case Update on case in Dev Queue with no Email or Previous Owner

textTemplates.name: CaseCommentEmailAlert
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!UserID.FirstName}!

{!CommentCreatorUser.FirstName} has left a comment on your case {!FoundCase.CaseNumber}

The comment is as follows:

{!InputCaseComment.CommentBody}

Please action this case accordingly
